name: Triple Bubble
description:
Note this is a demo version! The full game is still not finished.

This is your classic bubble popping game, with a twist: you can use 3 launchers to cover wider levels! This also allows you new aiming strategies.

This is a game for the Vircon32 game console (you can learn about it at its website). This game is open source, you can find the sources at the website or browse the code directly on GitHub. Enjoy!
